Package iiv.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MenuList.AttachedObject  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoExtendBoundedRangeModel
    Modifies the javax.swing.DefaultBoundedRangeModel to auto extend its size when setting a value outsides its current bounds.
    CNURowLayoutManager
    This is a basic display container window for iiV.
    EasyAddAbstractAction
    This abstract class adds some simple tools to AbstractAction for automatic creation of JComponents with tool tips and Mnemonics.
    JTextComponentChangeListener
    Class to note when document changes occur on a text field
    MenuList
    MenuList creates and maintains a menu listing items from a ListModel.
    TextAndSlider
    TextAndSlider creates a component for viewing and selecting integer values.
    VisibleStateButtonUpdate
    This class adds a simple tool for building a check box, radio button or standard button to control and track the visibility of a component.
